attribution: הספרייה הלאומית, מארכיון דן הדני. יוצר/ים: [יש לציין את שם היוצר/ים]. אם שם היוצר/ים אינו ידוע יש לציין: יוצר/ים: צוות יפפא The National Library of Israel, from Dan Hadani's Archive. Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Defence Minister Itzhak Rabin, Finance Minister Shimon Peres, General Secretary of the Histadrut Israel Keisar and heads of the Defence Industry in Israel held a meeting on the future of the Defence and Civil Industry of Israel and what they can do to imrove and push it forward, Rabin said that the main key is to enlage the export.
